title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.9 - Project control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.9 - Project control

State Regulations

The corporation, as agent of the municipality, shall have the
responsibility for the management and coordination of the project until
acceptance by the municipality. The municipality shall work through the
corporation and its designated representatives in all matters relating to
contractors and/or consultants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
